root: ^There is a time anomaly affecting the warp core.
^The warp core's design is a result of few very important historical discoveries
^If we want to fix this anomaly, we have to travel back in time to the time these discoveries were made, and fix the problem!
^It's a challenge, but the ship's AI assistant will be guiding you through your watch!
^Whenever you're ready, press on the button again and you'll be sent to the first anomaly!
